Obj.name: XB01
Obj.Desc: Element 1 : This formation of what seems to be totems is not natural My guess was right, this planet was once populated.. I wonder what's the link between these totems and the artefact i got..

Obj.name: XB02
Obj.Desc: Element 2 : Magic source detected. Found some part and it seems that they used this as lamp. They weren't that tribal after all, weren't they ?

Obj.name: XB03
Obj.Desc: Element 3 : Looks like a divine Totem. I wonder how does it work, and what it does...
